instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Highlights included discourses presented by a member of the Governing Body, a record number baptized at one time, and outstanding hospitality shown by the local brothers and sisters to some 3,500 delegates.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: Brother Kokkinakis’ faith and persistence in the ministry is an outstanding example for our brothers and sisters who are facing opposition to their preaching work.

input: One interviewee stated, “Yes, banks have access to my information... and Nigeria Ports Authority have access to our information”.

instruction: This task is about translating a given English language sentence to Yoruba language.
input: "On Thursday, July 4, 2019, the Ordzhonikidzevskiy District Court in the Russian city of Perm’ announced the conviction of Brother Aleksandr Solovyev and fined him 300,000 rubles ($4,731 U.S.).
output: "Ní Thursday, July 4, 2019, Ilé Ẹjọ́ Ordzhonikidzevskiy ní agbègbè Perm’ lórílẹ̀-èdè Rọ́ṣíà kéde pé Arákùnrin Aleksandr Solovyev jẹ̀bi ẹ̀sùn tí wọ́n fi kàn án, wọ́n sì ní kó san ìtanràn ohun tó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ tó ẹgbẹ̀rún márùn-ún (4,731) owó dọ́là.
